metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000832 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
ZoneMinder version <= 1.32.2 contains a Other/Unknown vulnerability inUser-controlled parameter that can result in Disclosure of confidentialdata, denial of service, SSRF, remote code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000832` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.32.3-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.32.3-2build1').
